programme.title: Everest: Beyond the Limit
programme.desc: Team Ones poor decisions have come back to haunt them as they reach camp four in the Death Zone and their bodies begin to shut down due to a lack of oxygen.

programme.title: Animal Cops Philadelphia
programme.desc: The team is shocked by a cats horrific injury. When the Animal Cops hunt for the offender they find more animals suffering in awful conditions.

programme.title: Animal Cops Philadelphia
programme.desc: An emaciated dog is brought into the centre weighing only a third of a healthy bodyweight, and the team quickly discovers its owner also needs their urgent help.

programme.title: Great White Kill Zone: Guadalupe
programme.desc: Great whites stalk and attack their prey by surprise. To figure out how they do it in the crystal-clear waters of Guadalupe, scientists use cutting-edge technology and special cameras to record never-before-seen hunting behavior.

programme.title: Predators Up Close with Joel Lambert
programme.desc: Former Navy Seal Joel Lambert travels to Zambia to investigate Africas most successful predator - the spotted hyena. The intelligence of the pack will astound Joel.

programme.title: My Cat From Hell
programme.desc: Behaviourist Jackson Galaxy helps a firefighter in Los Angeles who is struggling to deal with a crazy cat, while a Texan couple are disturbed by their kittys night-time terrors.

programme.title: Everest: Beyond the Limit
programme.desc: Five miles high in the Death Zone, Team One set off for the summit at midnight in minus 30 degrees, filmed by high intensity infra-red Sherpa Cams. But before the sun rises, Tim Medvetz falls and snaps two bones in his left hand. Hes in big trouble.

programme.title: Everest: Beyond the Limit
programme.desc: Summit day 2 proves exciting as asthmatic Mogens Jensen leaves Camp 4 on his fourth attempt to climb Everest. Also on his way to the top is 71-year-old Japanese climber, Katsusuke Yanagisawa, who will be the oldest person ever to summit if he makes it.

programme.title: Wild Costa Rica
programme.desc: Explore the incredible creatures that inhabit Costa Rica, one of the most ecologically diverse places on earth. Meet the rare and secretive ocelot and puma, and much more.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff visits a free clinic and returns with a dog who was hit by a car. Plus, he helps a dog with a mysterious lump and Dr. Baier wants to keep a rescue puppy.

programme.title: Shark Week
programme.desc: Paul de Gelder and James Glancy bail out of an aircraft at 3500-ft to experience what its like to crash land into some of the worlds most remote and shark-infested waters.

programme.title: Animal Cops Philadelphia
programme.desc: An undercover investigation leads the team to a shocking discovery: eight dogs tied to metal chains as well as dog-fighting paraphernalia, illegal drugs and a gun.

programme.title: Animal Cops Philadelphia
programme.desc: A shocking case of animal cruelty arrives at the Pennsylvania SPCA: a Labrador named Clyde has been attacked by another dog and left without veterinary care.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: The homestead of musician Lou and partner Stacey is threatened by water erosion and at serious risk from a torrential rainstorm. The Raneys come to the rescue.

programme.title: Jeremy Wades Dark Waters
programme.desc: A report of an underwater attack in Australia has caught Jeremy Wades attention. As his investigation unfolds, Jeremy is faced with the exciting possibility that a giant predator once thought extinct could be making a comeback.

programme.title: Jeremy Wades Dark Waters
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade has spent decades hunting river monsters in the most remote waters on the planet. With unrivaled skill and a healthy dose of luck, Jeremys caught nearly all the suspects, but there are plenty more fish on his bucket list.

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: Tia rescues a neglected puppy living in filthy conditions. Can they save her before its too late? Plus, two owners want a sibling for their 4-year-old dog, Chase.

programme.title: My Cat From Hell
programme.desc: Einstein the cat ferociously attacks whenever he sees the other house cat, Izzy; a couple expecting their first baby must make a decision about their indoor cat, Ben who was diagnosed with Toxoplasmosis which could threaten the newborns life.

programme.desc: Join the loveable animal friends as they visit a village in France! Watch the town bakers stretch dough for the hungry princess till it becomes a French baguette that the princess loves! Bon Appetit!

programme.title: The Egg Band
programme.desc: Lets play follow the leader! Its easy - all you have to do is touch your toes, now touch your nose! Thats right, come on!

programme.title: The World is a Wonder
programme.desc: Come and explore the life cycle of a robin redbreast! Join the robins as they sing, dance and build a lovely home together in their nest! The robin lays blue eggs! She sits on them to guard them and keep them warm! Watch the cute chicks as they hatch from their eggs and grow into sweet robins!

programme.title: Mice Builders
programme.desc: Join the mighty mice builders as they work and play! Come sing along and help them build their new home! What’s inside the package? A shower head? Of course not! It’s toilet paper!

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.sub-title: ジャングルブック・少年モーグリ
programme.desc: Join the young, wild Mowgli on his search of a village he can call home and meet the wacky, wonderful - and sometimes wily - jungle animals who tangle with him on his way.

programme.title: Ahoy Pirates!
programme.desc: Ahoy! Join Captain Katie, Beth, Jon Jon, and Ari are always on an exciting adventure to find a secret treasure! Help them solve puzzles and riddles and complete all the missions along the way!

programme.title: What A Wonderful Day
programme.desc: Join the amazing friends as they enjoy lunch time together! The sun is high in the sky! Eat a delicious and healthy lunch with butterflies and buzzing bees! Now it’s time to rest! Come along and take a nice nap on the soft hammocks!

programme.title: Stick with Mick
programme.desc: It’s time for Mick to take a bath. Join Mick as he has a wonderful time playing in the bathtub, filling it up with water, cleaning himself with a bar of soap and drying himself up with a towel. Now he is all nice and clean!

programme.title: Charlie and the Alphabet
programme.desc: H has a wonderful new hat to take to the alphabet party, but it gets blown away by the wind! Will he find a new hat to take to the party?

programme.title: Songs and Rhymes
programme.desc: Do you like the sun? All the children want to play with Mr. Golden Sun. Let’s ask him to shine down and play with us!

programme.title: Mini Matinee
programme.desc: Join the loveable animal friends as they visit Monaco. What happens when the driver can’t find Monaco? Discover the Princesses’ solution! A pole with a flag! What colour will the flag be? Come and see!

programme.title: Beep Beep
programme.desc: Roady and Voom Vam play outside in the mud. After getting covered in leaves, they try to race each other to clean themselves off. When that doesnt work, they find a new machine at the gas station. What does it do? Come find out.

programme.title: Songs and Rhymes
programme.desc: Baby Hippo is learning how to walk. On his way he meets a flying butterfly, a jumping frog and a crawling snail.

programme.title: Travelers
programme.desc: Harley and Perry find several pearls on the beach that have lost their shine. When they return the pearls to their shells, they shine once again in all their glory.

programme.title: Walter and Dude
programme.desc: Walter and Dude are looking for an item that blows air, turns around and cools you down. Is it a spinning top, a hairdryer, or an ice lolly? Join them as they discover it’s a fan!

programme.title: Songs and Rhymes
programme.desc: When we meet somebody everywhere we go, we say hello. Ola, bonjour, hello - “Hello” has different names – in English, French or Spanish. Let’s greet our friends from all around the world with a nice hello in their language.

programme.title: Bug’n’Play to the Rescue
programme.desc: Someone is having a birthday party and the bugs are all excited! But a strong gust of wind leaves Hop stranded on a balloon. Laz and Butterson find a clever way of helping him out.

programme.title: Happy Birthday to You
programme.desc: Make your child a star on BabyTV by creating their very own personalized birthday greeting. Using a digital photo, parents can create a clip for their child which can be viewed online or submitted to BabyTV for the chance of being featured on-air.

programme.title: The Lollipops Song Series
programme.desc: The Lollipops Song Series

programme.title: Cuddlies
programme.desc: Tickles needs a stool to look at himself in the mirror. His friends are taller than him and try to cheer him up, but then he learns that he has grown. Join them as they celebrate!

programme.title: Bath Tubbies
programme.desc: Froggy is blowing soap bubbles in the bathtub! Who’s spraying water on him? Ellie is playing ball and Ducky is sleeping on a mattress! Who could it be? Come along and find out! Join the fun and have a great time splashing and laughing in the tub with all the friends and cloud too!

programme.title: Songs and Rhymes
programme.desc: Billy and Bam play with a red balloon. When the balloon flies off the siblings run after it. Will they be able to get their balloon back?

programme.title: Oliver
programme.desc: What will Oliver discover on a boat? Hello Skipper! Join Oliver as he has lots of fun sailing on a boat. Come along and see what Oliver catches with a fishing rod! A trumpet, a boot and a bucket with a cute fish! Ship ahoy!

programme.title: The Egg Band
programme.desc: The Egg Band in their version of the classic nursery rhyme - The Finger Family. Come join the family and sing along!

programme.desc: It’s summer and a large bird with a long neck sings and hops on a tree! Autumn comes and the days get colder and so does the bird! Join the bird and his flock as they migrate to a warmer country! Come along and fly over land, lakes and deserts and build a new home on a nice tree!

programme.title: Zeinas Detective Agency
programme.desc: A highly familiar day-to-day object arrives at Zeina’s doorstep forgetting what it is used for. Searching for the answer, Zeina and her best friend Roy come up with a new and hilarious use for the surprised object. While they all have a great time with its new use, the object’s true use is revealed to them.

programme.title: Welcome to the island
programme.desc: The friends are telling fun riddles to each other, but Lily always tells the answer. And when a group of turtles play hide and seek on the island, Lily cant help but... tell.

programme.title: Good-Morning Stretch
programme.desc: Teeny and Tiny play imaginary games, the music game and whats hiding beneath the handkerchief.

programme.title: Mikes Bike
programme.sub-title: Le Petite and the High Chair
programme.desc: Petite cant reach the seat of her bicycle. It is too high. What can Mikey do to help her? Lets see...

programme.title: Stick with Mick
programme.desc: Mick is going home. Join Mick as he discovers various birthday decorations at home, including a birthday chair, a birthday cake with candles, a flower garland, and a present. When he opens the door and sees the guests, he finds out that it’s his birthday! Happy Birthday!

programme.title: Songs and Rhymes
programme.desc: Come join the fun as Bambam mischievously tries to frighten Billy as she peacefully eats her curds and whey

programme.title: Billy BamBam
programme.desc: Billy and BamBam enjoy eating soup for lunch in the garden. As the leaves fall from the trees, they play catch and dance in the “rain” of leaves. Join them as they create make-believe fans from the leaves to cool themselves off from the heat!

programme.title: Songs and Rhymes
programme.desc: Little Lola and Charlie have fun with the animals on the farm. Join them in this classic rendition of Old McDonald. Dont forget to "moo moo" and "oink oink"!

programme.title: Look What I Found
programme.desc: The friends paint on a sidewalk as the things they paint become real like a fence, steps to climb a mountain and more.

programme.desc: The Lollipops Song Series

programme.title: Hungry Henry
programme.desc: Henry wants to eat a tasty omelette but Chef George is out of eggs. Join Hungry Henry on his journey to find eggs. There aren’t any at the grocery store or in Jack’s truck, but there are eggs at the chicken coop, laid by the chickens! Come along and enjoy a warm omelette with Henry!

programme.desc: Join the mighty mice builders as they work and play! Come sing along and help them build their new home! What’s inside the package? A computer mouse to use with a computer!

programme.title: Walter and Dude
programme.desc: Walter and Dude the Dog are looking for an item that is yellow, cute, and squeaks. Is it a banana, a toy car, or perhaps Walter himself? Join the two friends as they discover it’s a rubber duckie bath toy!

programme.title: Oliver
programme.desc: What will Oliver find in the closet? Help Oliver look for his yellow glove! Join Oliver as he has lots of fun dressing up with a cowboy hat and jester’s hat! Come along and enjoy the cuddly surprise in the drawer! Is it a scarf? No, it’s a cute cat, of course! Meow!

programme.title: Songs and Rhymes
programme.sub-title: One, Two, Buckle my shoe (Charlies song)
programme.desc: “One, two, buckle my shoe; Three, four, shut the door…” Counting is the best! Let’s join Charlie and the Numbers in this popular and cheerful song and count from one to ten.

programme.desc: Teeny and Tiny play hide and seek, whos the odd one out and the big and small game.

programme.title: Snail Trail

programme.title: Bug’n’Play to the Rescue
programme.desc: Laz, Hop and Butterson compete in the long jump. Hop jumps a little too high and finds himself stuck in a spiders web. When Laz tries to help out, she gets stuck as well! Now its up to Butterson to save the day

programme.title: Songs and Rhymes
programme.desc: Meet the clever little teapot, short and stout. It has a little handle and spout, and when it sings and whistles, just poor it out.

programme.desc: Tickles wants to form a band and composes a tune to play. The friends joke around, so Tickles gets upset. Join the friends as they cheer him up, play music and enjoy a musical day!

programme.desc: Petite has a serious problem - she cant stop her bike! Who is she going to turn to for help? Mikey of course!

programme.desc: Hey! A coconut just fell from the tree. Its fun to play with a coconut. Catch, Leo! Catch, Pix! But who will get it first?

The World is a Wonder is an exciting and intriguing show that encourages your little ones to learn and discover the magical transformations of nature with easy-to-follow visuals and imagery - the amazing life cycles of animals, how plants grow, the seasons of the year, how caterpillars turn to butterflies and much more with Gaia the adorable fairy.

programme.desc: The brave mouse wants to join his friend the bird on the cuckoo clock. He tries climbing, jumping, and flying until he finally manages to unite with his friend.

programme.desc: Join the mighty mice builders as they work and play! Come sing along and help them build their new home! What’s inside the package? A rocking horse to ride on and have a fun time!

programme.desc: Mick wants to have a tea party. Join Mick as he has lots of fun getting ready for the fancy party! He spreads out a nice tablecloth on the table, and prepares a teapot, colorful mugs, napkins and a delicious cake! Come along and enjoy the tea party with Mick and rabbit!

programme.desc: Is your child good at drawing? Maybe hell be the next Leonardo De Vinci! Meanwhile watch him draw the Mona Lisa.

Suddenly, Yaya begins to sneeze as well! Join the two cute elephants to see how Maya takes care of Yaya and enjoy playing with them! Bless you!

programme.title: Draco
programme.desc: Join Draco as he learns the difference between opposites – dirty and clean. After getting dirty from playing in the mud, Draco takes a good long bath and comes out clean. He even gives his cute teddy bear a bath and they both are clean as can be!

programme.title: Lets Dance
programme.desc: Get off your couch and start to move! Kids will love to dance and move to energetic music while interacting with animated characters. Come join the beat!

programme.title: Kiku at the Home
programme.desc: Its time to relax, slow down and unwind with Kiku. Calming visuals and soft music are great ways to prepare for bed.

programme.title: Songs and Rhymes
programme.desc: Toto and Robbie fly with their spaceship to wake up a sleepy star so it can shine through the night.

programme.title: Songs and Rhymes

programme.desc: Elephant and Hippo go on a picnic on their boat. Elephant manages to catch a fish but ouch! He got bitten! Come count the fish along with Baby, Hippo and Elephant.

programme.desc: Come pick potatoes with your favorite BabyTV friends - Hippo, elephant, Squirrel, Rabbit and Baby!

programme.title: Songs and Rhymes
programme.desc: The entire family is having fun playing football outside when it starts raining! With a little help from their imagination, the family finds a fun way of playing football indoors!

programme.desc: Ducky, Ellie and Froggy are having fun fishing in the bathtub! Froggy catches something big! What can it be? A treasure chest, of course! What’s inside? Come and see! programme.title: Good Night Teddy Bear
programme.desc: Teddy is getting ready for bed! He tells Mama Bear about his adventures during lunch time! Join the fun and see all of Teddy’s wonderful animal friends as they come out of his lunch box one by one! Play the train game with the friends before they hop back inside the magical lunch box!

programme.title: Maya and Yaya
programme.desc: Maya and Yaya love eating peaches. Yaya buries his peach pit in the ground, waters it and a peach tree grows. Maya buries a few toys, waters them and waits for a toy tree to grow, but it doesn’t happen! Join the two cute elephants to see how Maya’s toy tree surprisingly grows! Come along, join the fun and enjoy tasty peaches!

programme.desc: Elephatn, Giraffe and Rabbit sure know some moves. Join them as they count and dance!

programme.title: Stitches
programme.desc: Its Needles first time ice skating. Skating is not easy as it looks. Needles tries again and again but he keeps falling and falling. Will he be able to come to the rescue when hes needed?

programme.title: Grandpa Joes Magical Playground
programme.desc: Join Grandpa Joe and friends to see the surprise they build with magical parts! Connect the blocks, cones and parts to create a cute kangaroo! Hop along and see the special surprise that comes out of the pouch!

programme.title: Pix and Leo

programme.title: Olly
programme.desc: Ollys adventure is out of this world! Hes flying to the moon and Kitty, Dolly and Snail join in on the fun!

programme.title: Beep Beep
programme.desc: Voom Vam tries to jump over a hole in the road but falls in! Roady and Trucky join forces to help get her out.

programme.title: Songs and Rhymes
programme.sub-title: Shell be Coming Round the Mountain
programme.desc: Do you like horseback riding, singing and having lots of fun? Join Little Lola, Charlie, Hungry Henry and friends in this fun and cheerful classic folk song. Let’s ride together! Yay!

programme.title: Crafty Rafty
programme.desc: Come along and have lots of fun with egg cartons! Hop on the carton choo choo train with pasta wheels! Travel through magical carton mountains and noodle trees! See the chick in the spaghetti nest! Join Crafty Rafty as he creates cute carton rabbits!

programme.title: My Robot and I
programme.desc: Kim and Kit play football together, but when its Kits turn to kick the ball, he discovers its difficult to kick when you have wheels instead of feet!

programme.title: Songs and Rhymes
programme.desc: Baby butterfly picks roses and meets friends along the way - Hippo, Elephant, Turtle and more. Careful not to sneeze!

programme.title: Happy Birthday to You

programme.title: Mini Matinee
programme.desc: Join the loveable animal friends as they visit a little village in Yemen! Watch Nura complain about Halil’s pea soup! Add lots of pepper to it and see what happens when Nura tastes the spicy soup!

programme.title: The Egg Band
programme.desc: Snow White has got her own song! Come hear about the 7 dwarves, prince charming, and the wicked witch.

programme.title: The World is a Wonder
programme.desc: Nature is full of wonder and surprises. The World is a Wonder is an exciting and intriguing show that encourages your little ones to learn and discover the magical transformations of nature with easy-to-follow visuals and imagery - the amazing life cycles of animals, how plants grow, the seasons of the year, how caterpillars turn to butterflies and much more with Gaia the adorable fairy.

programme.title: Songs and Rhymes
programme.sub-title: Hole in the Middle of the Sea
programme.desc: Elephant and Baby Butterfly go on an expedition under the sea in a yellow submarine. In the sea they see a frog on a log, Squirrel watering a flowerbed, a shipwrecked pirate ship and more!

programme.title: Mice Builders
programme.desc: Join the mighty mice builders as they work and play! Come sing along and help them build their new home! What’s inside the package? A telephone to call friends and say hello!

programme.desc: When we meet somebody everywhere we go, we say hello. Ola, bonjour, hello - “Hello” has different names – in English, French or Spanish. Let’s greet our friends from all around the world with a nice hello in their language.

programme.title: Mini Matinee
programme.desc: Join the loveable animal friends as they visit Mexico. Jose makes himself a big hat! When it’s hot and when it rains, it protects him! All the workers want a sombrero hat too and they all become friends!

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben travels to Sweden to meet Annalisa, the Italian chose a life on the streets of Europe as a teenager, and now is developing a forest hideaway on the fringes of Swedish society for her and her toddler.

programme.title: Walking With Dinosaurs
programme.desc: At the edge of the Moroccan Sahara, an international team of palaeontologists lead by Dr Nizar Ibrahim has uncovered the bones of one of the largest predatory dinosaurs that ever walked the Earth: a Spinosaurus.

programme.title: Julius Caesar: The Making of a Dictator
programme.desc: Events beyond Caesars control threaten to unravel his plans and leave him isolated. Pushed into a corner, he makes a decision that will change the course of the republic forever. 2/3

programme.title: Fishing Impossible
programme.desc: The guys head to the turquoise waters of The Bahamas and try to catch venomous Lionfish without being stung.

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Steve and the team head to Sani Lodge in the Amazon rainforest to find one of the most feared snakes on Earth - the fer de lance. However, finding one wont be easy in this dense jungle habitat.

programme.title: The Misadventures of Romesh Ranganathan
programme.desc: All Romesh knows about Colombia is cocaine barons and for most of his life, that was more than enough to stop him wanting to visit. But is Colombias reputation for drug wars justified? 4/5

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben Fogle meets people who have moved to inhospitable parts of the world after leaving the rat race behind. Here he travels to the Namibian desert to spend time with 50-year-old Gideon David, who quit his career in life insurance to live in the largest conservation area in Africa. Ben embraces the harsh and relentless work of farm life in temperatures pushing 40C, tending more than 150 animals, repairing baboon damage to water pipes and learning how to castrate sheep with his teeth.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Sue Aikens tracks the abundance of creatures roaming around her camp. Andy Bassich and Denise Becker hope to build a lasting legacy along the Yukon River.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace is in West Yorkshire, visiting a huge factory that makes more than 5,000 sofas every year. Meanwhile, Cherry Healey learns about the science of light bulbs.

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: This programme focuses on the predatory skills of some of the most charismatic hunters found on the planet: whales, dolphins, tuna, shark and rapier-nosed billfish. The open ocean is unimaginably immense - it covers more than 360 million square kilometres of the Earths surface. Much of this huge expanse of seawater is marine desert with virtually no sign of life. Yet the fastest and most powerful survive, playing a deadly game of hide-and-seek with their prey. This charts how they track down prey in the seemingly featureless seas, following the extraordinary life of yellowfin tuna from a minute egg to a 200 kilogram, voracious predatory giant.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: Police officers form a human chain as they attempt the dramatic rescue of a family of four during Tropical Storm Imelda, which unleashed record-breaking floods on Texas. A hike goes horribly wrong in Hawaii, when a sightseer slips.

programme.title: The Future of Nature
programme.desc: Documentary about the oceans and how science is helping combat the impact of climate change.

programme.title: The Misadventures of Romesh Ranganathan
programme.desc: In a festive special, Rom visits the Sahara Desert. Guided by Bobo, a local of Berber descent, Rom discovers a place that is vast and inhospitable, and utterly beautiful. 5/5

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: The Hailstones work to repair a vital piece of equipment for their hunting grounds. Sue Aikens contends with the dangers of the tundra while hunting for small game.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: In Alaska, Ben Fogle meets Mike and Fran, who live in a self-built log cabin in a remote spot ten days walk from civilisation. The family have created a completely self-sufficient lifestyle, working the land and trapping animals.

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: A look at the survival techniques of creatures that endure the harsh conditions of the Arctic and Antarctic. For animals at both poles, life is dominated by the annual retreat and advance of the freezing sea ice and the challenge of surviving winters when temperatures drop. In the Arctic the polar bear is the top predator, catching seals on the ice and forcing seabirds to nest high up on cliffs. In Antarctica the flightless penguins have no ground-based predators to deal with but lurking in the water is the constant threat from leopard seals. Narrated by David Attenborough.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace visits a colourful factory that produces 200,000 litres of paint and 10,000 metres of wallpaper every week.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Alaskans break trail and hunt for their survival during the tail end of the brutal winter.

programme.desc: Native Glaswegian Susan rejected retirement for a remote region of Africa, where she has set up both a school and a mountain-top restaurant.

programme.desc: An orphaned baby triceratops must outwit a deadly T-rex. Today, paleontologists are uncovering her remains, allowing us to bring her story to life with stunning VFX.

programme.desc: Ben ventures off the wild coast of Northern Ireland to the remote and rugged island of Rathlin. He stays with 41-year-old Rauri Morgan, a former HR executive who turned his back on corporate life.

programme.title: The Space Shuttle That Fell to Earth
programme.desc: As Nasa prepares Space Shuttle Columbia for its 28th mission, excitement and trepidation build amongst the astronauts and their families as they count down to launch. 1/3

programme.desc: Tony Robinson travels the length of the Nile, from Cairo to Aswan, to investigate tombs of all shapes and sizes, and meets the archaeologists, including John Ward, who are unearthing extraordinary wonders.

programme.title: The Misadventures of Romesh Ranganathan
programme.desc: For most of Romeshs adult life, the only news coming out of Zimbabwe has been bad news. Robert Mugabe, the eviction of the white farmers and a general aura of danger have combined to make Zimbabwe a no-go zone in the eyes of the world. Now, with Mugabe finally gone, Rom is travelling around the country to find out if Brits should be holidaying here once more. Rom is met by Chipo, a teacher who was born and raised in Harare under Mugabes rule. She explains that although people have been coming to the country, few venture beyond Victoria Falls. She wants to show Rom what they are missing on a grand, epic road trip that takes in stunning National Parks and close-up encounters with rhinos, elephants and the cheetah ambassador. Along the way he gets caught in biblical lightning storms, re-enacts the film Titanic on a Lake Kariba houseboat and tries the home-brewed beer he made in a bathtub in Bulawayo. But safe as the country feels, Rom is visiting at a time of undeniable turmoil. Mile-long petrol queues form at every station - the fallout of the countrys latest economic crisis. Rom learns about the origins of the conflict - from the denial of black culture in the Rhodesian era to the legacy of Cecil Rhodes - and finds out why this generation of Zimbabweans are so desperate for people to visit.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace explores the secrets of the Guinness brewery in Dublin to reveal how it makes two million litres of Irish stout every single day. Plus, Cherry Healey visits a water treatment centre to learn how Dublin gets clean drinking water.

programme.title: Life Below Zero

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Special compilation episode following seven people who live in one of the worlds loneliest places. They must overcome snow storms, frozen terrain and limited resources to survive.

programme.title: Beyond Paradise
programme.desc: A fishing trawler heads out to sea with three brothers and their ailing stepmother aboard. When it returns to Shipton Abbott harbour several hours later, only the three fishermen remain. A note found on deck suggests the woman took her own life. As her estranged daughter comes to town to help make funeral arrangements, the simple case grows more complex. Meanwhile, its the day of the house visit, but its no plain sailing for Humphrey and Martha.

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: Thomas investigates the case of John Sealy, a soldier who died during a military training exercise involving exposure to CS gas. It appears John died from an aneurism, but when Thomas discovers the trace of a possible nerve agent in his system, the family are desperate for answers. Was a chemical weapon involved or is there a more innocent explanation?

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: Jack is rushed to hospital after collapsing at the scene of a car crash. Following Thomass discovery that soldier John Sealy may have been exposed to a nerve agent, is it possible someone is targeting the victims family? With Jacks life in the balance, its down to Nikki, Thomas and Clarissa to find the truth and save their friend.

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Cynthias rounds find her administering insulin injections to diabetic John Lacey, a deplorable bully who consistently belittles his wife Annie.

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: Part 2 of 2. After the body of Dr Stephen Black is found on an Oxford tour bus, Lewis and Hathaway are lead to Crevecoeur Hall, a sprawling Oxford estate where Hathaway spent much of his childhood.

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: Whodunit set on the Caribbean island of Saint Marie, where the sun shines all day and it seems half the residents are killers-in-waiting. And so it appears this week as the locals set out to celebrate the New Year - only for the festivities to be cut short when a masked man stabs a woman in her own home, providing Detective Inspector Jack Mooney and his team with yet another murder to solve. Ardal OHanlon stars as the Irish detective - although as has been widely reported, he will soon be leaving the lead role - with guest appearances by Adrian Edmondson, Nina Wadia and Samuel West

programme.title: Friday Night Dinner
programme.desc: Adam isnt happy when he is forced to play his violin for Mum and her best friend Val, while Jonny is relishing every moment. Dad is obsessed with his old microscope.

programme.title: Friday Night Dinner
programme.desc: The boys are threatened with no crumble if they dont help to assemble a wooden shelf, while Jims dog Wilson keeps doing his dollops in Mum and Dads flowerbed.

programme.title: The Durrells
programme.desc: Everything is looking particularly beautiful in Corfu as the family prepare for celebrations. Sven survives a grilling by his potential new family and passes with flying colours but is everything all that it seems?

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Chummy and PC Noakes meet with new challenges as they settle back down to life in Poplar while the convent is under threat from property development.

programme.title: Hope Street
programme.desc: Its Clint and Nicoles wedding day, but best man Finn and bridesmaid Leila are busy investigating the theft of some much loved therapy sheep. Finns 15-year-old daughter Niamh is back for the wedding.

programme.title: Father Brown
programme.desc: A mother confronts a former hangman, Henry Lee, at his wedding anniversary about her son he executed, for murdering a court secretary, a year ago. An execution where the condemned man whispered to Lee who the killer was. The following morning Lee is poisoned with Hemlock. His friend George, an ex policeman, is arrested and released. The mother, recently released from prison, is arrested and a motive for Lees wife emerges. Father Brown untangles a web of deceit and corruption in the police as Lee lies dying.

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: Part 2 of 2. After the body of Dr Stephen Black is found on an Oxford tour bus, Lewis and Hathaway are lead to Crevecoeur Hall, a sprawling Oxford estate where Hathaway spent much of his childhood.

Ardal OHanlon stars as the Irish detective - although as has been widely reported, he will soon be leaving the lead role - with guest appearances by Adrian Edmondson, Nina Wadia and Samuel West

programme.title: Ghosts
programme.desc: Fortune smiles on Mike and Alison when a TV company comes calling, looking for an old house in which to film a period drama. But to get the money in the bank, Alison must ensure the shoot goes well.

programme.title: Ghosts
programme.desc: Learning that their posh neighbours have an ancient claim over their land, Mike and Alison throw a swanky dinner party to help resolve the thorny issue. But with the ghosts her only guide to high-class decorum, the evening starts badly and only gets worse, thanks to Mary’s woeful catering, Mike’s clueless deal-making and Robin’s raucous celebration of the lunar eclipse. Elsewhere, the banished ghosts become obsessed with a TV sitcom, but will they shake off their obsession to help Alison in her hour of need?

programme.title: London Kills
programme.desc: When the body of a woman turns up by the river, the detectives track a suspect through a dating site, only to find he may have shot himself. While Rob and Vivienne disagree about whether it was a murder-suicide, Billie worries about Amber, a witness in another case.

programme.title: London Kills
programme.desc: With Billie stabbed and her attacker on the loose, Vivienne blames herself for not recognizing that Billie was in danger. As the team scrambles to track down Amber, they discover that there’s more to her than meets the eye.

programme.title: Father Brown
programme.desc: Father Brown is apprehensive when he receives an invitation to a party given by the recently released Uncle Mirth, a former music hall comedian Brown helped to put in an asylum. When Brown and the other invitees arrive at the venue, a derelict warehouse, he and Mirths brother find envelopes containing their death certificates. Inspector Mallory finds another death certificate for a second brother who had died of a heart attack outside the Presbytery the previous day.

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: Part 1 of 2. When amateur stargazer and Master of Gresham College, Andrew Crompton, is found dead at the foot of the University Observatory stairs, Lewis and Hathaway get a rare insight into the hierarchical nature of college life.

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: Take a trip down memory lane as commissioner Selwyn Patterson celebrates 50 years of police service at the Yacht Club. But the day takes a turn when he is shot and rushed to hospital.

programme.title: The Jetty
programme.desc: Still reeling from her shocking discovery, Ember is desperate to find out what Riz knows about the Amy Knightly case. They begin to share information and Ember tells Riz her suspicions about the identity of Mirandas abuser. Ember is horrified when shes told that the lake is to be searched for Amys remains. When Riz stops returning Embers calls, Ember suspects that its because she has uncovered the terrible truth about what happened to Amy. Crime drama, starring Jenna Coleman and Weruche Opia

programme.title: Beyond Paradise
programme.desc: Humphrey and Marthas wedding day has finally arrived and now they’ve come face-to-face with the lavish affair organized by Anne. But such a big day seems to have come all too quickly, and Anne’s plans feel far grander than anything either of them wanted. Meanwhile, there’s no rest for the Shipton Abbott team. They have to deal with the theft of a valuable museum piece and a nefarious pair of cyber criminals before they can join in the celebrations. With bride and groom running around, and thieves running amok in Shipton Abbott, we find out whether the team can wrap everything up in time to mark Humphrey and Martha’s long-awaited union, or whether fate has other plans.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!

programme.title: Clarence

programme.title: Clarence

programme.desc: La nuova mappatura del distretto scolastico prevede un cambio di scuola per Sumo che dovra trasferirsi alla Aberdale Ovest. Clarence fa di tutto per impedirlo.

programme.title: Orizzonti Pokemon
programme.sub-title: La prima neve di Roy e Fuecoco
programme.desc: Ora che Dot ha superato il suo test di pratica del terallenamento, è il momento della sfida di Roy a Neveria. Per arrivarci, Liko, Roy e Dot devono attraversare Sierra Napada nel bel mezzo di una forte nevicata. Roy fa la sua prima esperienza con la neve e insieme a Fuecoco si diverte a giocare e conoscere nuovi Pokemon selvatici. Alla fine, i tre Allenatori decidono di passare la notte in una baita, ma prima si dividono per cercare legna per il fuoco. A un certo punto, Roy e Fuecoco si separano e dovranno ritrovarsi prima che faccia buio e scendano le temperature. Riusciranno a riunirsi in tempo?

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: E in corso il secondo tempo della finale del campionato nazionale esordienti, che vede contrapposte la Nankatsu e il Meiwa. Rimasta momentaneamente in dieci per via di un infortunio patito da Misaki e dopo aver subito il pareggio di Kojiro, la Nankatsu puo di nuovo contare sul suo numero 11, che sembra essersi ripreso, almeno in parte, dal colpo subito alla gamba. La Nankatsu approfitta della tattica spregiudicata degli avversari e con un rapido contropiede sfiora il goal del vantaggio. Sul successivo ribaltamento di fronte, dopo essersi liberato di Misaki, Kojiro si trova a tu per tu con Wakabayashi nellarea della Nankatsu, e sorprende lestremo difensore con un tiro potentissimo che termina in rete.

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Alla fine del tempo regolamentare, il punteggio della finale del torneo è ancora di parità. Nankatsu e Meiwa lottano alla pari, ma ne Tsubasa ne Kojiro riescono a segnare un goal.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball finalmente ottiene il suo primo telefono cellulare ma non lo chiama nessuno e cosi lo regala a Darwin che ne diventa subito schiavo al punto da non peterne piu fare a meno.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: Richard trova lavoro come fattorino e questo sconvolge lequilibrio delluniverso. Nicole e i ragazzi si attivano subito per ripristinarlo ma non sara unimpresa facile.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball e Darwin accettano linvito di Carrie per festeggiare Halloween. I due ragazzi bevono un goccio di una misteriosa pozione per diventare fantasmi ma la situazione precipita.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball Darwin e Anais scoprono che tutti i loro soldi sono stati utilizzati per un misterioso investimento. Altre ricerche li portano a scoprire la verita che va oltre la loro immaginazione.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball aiuta Darwin ad essere piu franco e diretto con il prossimo e questi impara cosi bene la lezione da attaccare chiunque incontri sbattendogli in faccia la realta.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: La signorina Scimmiotta e convinta che Gumball e Darwin vogliano prenderla in giro e cerca in tutti i modi di farli mettere in punizione dal preside Brown.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: Clayton assume mille forme e disorienta i ragazzi che si trovano a inventare loro malgrado la storia di un teschio che li spaventa. Alla fine dopo mille bugie viene fuori la verita.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: Babbo Natale perde la memoria in un incidente con Richard. Una volta rientrato in se dovra sempre fare i conti con Richard che e partito con la slitta e non sa come atterrare.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: Le famiglie Watterson e Finkleheimner litigano da secoli per un orologio. Adesso tocca a Gumball e Darwin gestire il pomo della discordia.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball si diverte a vincere le scommesse e cosi obbliga Robot a fargli da schiavo. Il problema e che Robot esegue anche i suoi desideri piu pericolosi.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball vuole adottare lo stile di vita semplice di Idaho una patata campagnola. Non solo vuole imporlo anche a tutta la famiglia che a un certo punto scoppiera.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: I ragazzi devono fare delle commissioni tenendo docchio il padre che quando e sotto anestesia ne combina di tutti i colori. Purtroppo succede lirreparabile.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: Arriva nonna Jojo a terrorizzare la famiglia Watterson colpita da vari incidenti per preservarla dai pericoli del mondo ma Nicole le insegnera la necessita di imparare dagli errori.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball e Darwin noleggiano un film su un pony ma sulla strada del ritorno troveranno degli ostacoli che rischieranno di mandare in fumo la visione del film.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: La relazione tra Palloncino e Carmen e talmente perfetta che lei per paura che subentri la noia decide di far ingelosire il suo uomo fingendo una simpatia per Gumball.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball sogna che Darwin bacia Nocciolina e quando si sveglia non riesce a perdonarlo. Poi i due decidono di entrare nei loro sogni per cambiare il finale ma troveranno una sorpresa.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: Darwin si lamenta di essere la spalla a Gumball cosi lamico gli passa la palla per recuperare un gioco che Tobias non restituisce. Ma Darwin poco avvezzo a decidere esagera un po.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: Il papa di Gumball si offende perche ha sentito il figlio prenderlo in giro per la sua inettitudine ma Darwin preparera lo scenario adatto per la riconciliazione.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball deve fare la foto scolastica ed e angosciato perche non e fotogenico. Dopo vari tentativi Darwin riuscira a dargli un aspetto diverso ma destinato a fallire.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: Il papa di Gumball ingaggia una faida col vicino finche non si ritrovano in un cassonetto a ragionare sulla loro follia.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball e Darwin finiscono nella prigione scolastica per non aver fatto un compito ma ovviamente non impareranno la lezione.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: La famiglia va al supermercato e i ragazzi chiedono dolci con una certa insistenza. Ma quando le richieste diventano sempre piu pressanti la mamma subisce una raccapricciante trasformazione.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: La mamma trova sotto il letto dei ragazzi un vecchio gioco che Gumball butta ma il papa lha recuperato esponendo la famiglia a un tremendo pericolo. Il gioco infatti diventa realta.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball e Darwin stanno aspettando luscita di un nuovo gioco. Ma spunta Banana Joe che sembra avere un contenzioso con loro a rovinare i piani di Darwin.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball e Darwin comunicano su un social network ma finiscono per bloccare qualcuno che la prende come unoffesa personale e comincia a minacciarli.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: Arriva Juke un nuovo compagno di scuola che parla solo col ritmo della batteria. Gumball e Darwin fanno di tutto per capirlo ma quando sono vicini alla soluzione si distraggono e salta tutto.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: Papa non sa dire di no a nessuno e tutti si piazzano in casa di Gumball a fare i loro comodi. I ragazzi tentano inutilmente di cacciarli quando allimprovviso arriva la mamma.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: I ragazzi trovano nella spazzatura la lettera di un misterioso spasimante della madre per cui mettono in moto un piano perfetto per allontanare lintruso ma inutilmente.

programme.desc: Sir Petolotto va in pensione, si deve nominare un nuovo cavaliere tra chi riuscira ad estrarre la spada dalla porcellana/Furto in una galleria darte, ma non ce un solo ladro!

programme.title: New Looney Tunes

programme.title: New Looney Tunes
programme.desc: Gabby la capra si rivolge al centro benessere di Porky per rilassarsi e alleviare i suoi disturbi da stress/Daffy, con il suo assistente Porky, cerca la rarissima orchidea blu di Cuernacava.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!

programme.desc: Gumball Darwin e Anais scoprono che tutti i loro soldi sono stati utilizzati per un misterioso investimento. Altre ricerche li portano a scoprire la verita che va oltre la loro immaginazione.

programme.desc: La signorina Scimmiotta e convinta che Gumball e Darwin vogliano prenderla in giro e cerca in tutti i modi di farli mettere in punizione dal preside Brown.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball
programme.desc: Le famiglie Watterson e Finkleheimner litigano da secoli per un orologio. Adesso tocca a Gumball e Darwin gestire il pomo della discordia.

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: La Nankatsu si e aggiudicata il campionato nazionale esordienti e Tsubasa riceve la bandiera della vittoria. A margine della cerimonia di chiusura Kaori, la rappresentante dellAccademia Toho, comunica a Kojiro che e stato selezionato per unirsi alla prestigiosa scuola insieme a Tsubasa, e lui accetta. Il capitano della Nankatsu invece e intenzionato ad andare in Brasile con Roberto. Scopre pero tramite una lettera che lex campione brasiliano e partito senza di lui: il giovane fuoriclasse non potra quindi coronare il suo sogno. Qualche giorno dopo, anche Misaki e in partenza, seppure con un giorno di anticipo rispetto alla data prefissata, e poco prima di salire sullautobus viene intercettato dai suoi compagni e da Tsubasa, che gli lancia una palla con sopra la firma di tutti i componenti della squadra.

programme.title: Lo straordinario mondo di Gumball

programme.desc: Darwin e geloso del rapporto fra Gumball e Nocciolina perche si sente escluso dalla vita del fratello. La sua gelosia li fara lasciare ma poi grazie al suo aiuto si riappacificheranno.

programme.desc: Nonna Jojo presenta alla famiglia il suo nuovo fidanzato Louie ma il figlio non riesce ad accettarlo. Per risolvere il conflitto Gumball propone una sfida di mascolinita.

programme.desc: La signorina Scimmia non vuole liberare una farfalla chiusa in un barattolo perche teme il cosiddetto effetto farfalla ma Gumball e Darwin non le prestano ascolto e si scatena di tutto.

programme.desc: Ieniemienie is vandaag de mevrouw van het hotel. Ze heeft een telefoon en een wekker.

programme.title: Brugklas
programme.desc: Jade schrikt als uit dreigt te komen dat zij en Ramses de striptekeningen van de leraren hebben gemaakt.

programme.title: Het Klokhuis
programme.desc: Pascal brengt een ode aan de boom. Er zijn tienduizenden verschillende soorten, ze staan overal ter wereld en ze zijn ongelooflijk belangrijk. Sommige bomen worden wel tweeduizend jaar oud en honderd meter hoog. Hoe komt het water uit de grond helemaal tot aan de top? Pascal duikt met bioloog Edwin en boomonderzoeker Paul het bos in. Hoe werkt een boom? Hoe eet en drinkt een boom? Hoe reageren bomen op een veranderend klimaat? En wat maakt dat we niet zonder ze kunnen? Tovenaarsleerling Barry Snotter zoekt hout voor een vliegende bezem.

programme.title: NOS Journaal in makkelijke taal
programme.desc: Journaal in makkelijke taal met extra uitleg en in een rustig tempo. Met het laatste nieuws en het weer.

programme.title: BinnensteBuiten
programme.desc: In Rhenen geniet Jeanne van haar gelijkvloerse villa waar de ramen en schuifdeuren aan alle kanten open kunnen naar de prachtige tuin. * In het Friese dorpje Menaam eten de koeien van Jan en Johanneke uit een speciale voederhaag van struiken, die veel voordelen geeft aan dier en natuur. Met de melk van de koeien wordt ambachtelijk roomijs gemaakt. Chef-kok Sharon gaat langs om te kijken, te proeven en maakt met het ijs een lekker dessert. * In Zeewolde gaat boswachter Marieke met ecoloog Eric op zoek naar insecten in het bos. Het gonst en zweeft en krioelt in het Horsterwold en de insecten hebben allemaal unieke eigenschappen.

programme.title: EenVandaag
programme.desc: Meerderheid Tweede Kamer wil maatregelen tegen vrouwengeweld * Wie was de vermoorde Charlie Kirk? * Erkenning Palestijnse Staat bij VN-top * Wachtlijsten verpleeghuizen gedaald, maar mantelzorgers hebben het veel drukker

programme.title: Eva
programme.desc: De zoveelste politieke aanslag van de afgelopen tijd. Gisteravond werd Trump-bondgenoot en verspreider van het MAGA-woord Charlie Kirk vermoord tijdens een bijeenkomst op de universiteit van Utah. Laila Frank, Tom van t Einde en Wouter de Winther over wat dit betekent voor Amerika. * Sander van Hoorn en Nadia Moussaid zijn terug uit Israël, waar ze van dichtbij zagen hoe Israëliërs naar de oorlog in Gaza kijken. Waarom steunt een groot deel van de Israëlische samenleving de gebeurtenissen daar? * Comedytheater Toomler is de kraamkamer van Nederlands comedytalent. Rayen Panday, Rene van Meurs en Lenette van Dongen over de legendarische plek.

programme.title: NOS Journaal
programme.desc: Met het laatste nieuws, gebeurtenissen van nationaal en internationaal belang en de weersverwachting. En op NPO 1 extra met gebarentaal.

programme.title: Dit Was Het Nieuws
programme.desc: Jan Jaap van der Wal en Michelle Haas tegen Niels van der Laan en Jeroen Woe.

programme.title: Stand van Nederland: Aangehaakt
programme.desc: Doordat de bouwsector de laatste decennia wereldwijd explosief is gegroeid, zijn sommige natuurlijke grondstoffen, als we doorbouwen zoals we dat nu doen, nog deze eeuw uitgeput. Zo zal er bijvoorbeeld niet meer voldoende geschikt zand zijn om beton mee te maken. De bouw moet duurzamer, sterker nog: in 2050 moet hij volledig circulair zijn. In het Gelderse Heerde is een unieke methode bedacht om dat te bereiken: legoliseren. Niet slopen, maar gebouwen demonteren in grote bouwstenen, waarmee daarna weer nieuwe bouwprojecten kunnen worden gerealiseerd.

programme.title: Zembla
programme.desc: Elon Musk belooft al jaren zelfrijdende autos die veiliger rijden dan mensen. Met de introductie van het Autopilot-systeem zette Tesla tien jaar geleden de eerste stap. De autos golden als groen en innovatief, maar raakten betrokken bij zware ongelukken in de Verenigde Staten en Europa. Dat leidde tot scherpe kritiek, onderzoeken en rechtzaken. Toch zet Musk door en hij hoopt dit jaar nog goedkeuring te krijgen voor de introductie van Full Self Driving in Europa. Zembla onderzoekt hoe het kan dat Teslas Autopilot-systeem al jaren wordt gelinkt aan ongelukken, en welke rol de Nederlandse Rijksdienst voor het Wegverkeer daarbij speelt.

programme.desc: In Almere Oosterwold hebben Mara en Pim hun eigen duurzame huis ontworpen: licht, ruim en omringd door een grote tuin. Hun inrichting is een mix van tweedehands vondsten en familiestukken. * Op de paarsgekleurde heide van Doorwerth helpt Alain Caron mee de 300 schapen van Clemens en Marjel te hoeden. Zo houden zij de biodiversiteit van het gebied in stand. Alain verrast ze met een lekker gerecht. * In Oudewater werkt ecoloog Peter met passie aan het behoud van de Nederlandse natuur. Uit het hele land verzamelt hij inheemse wilde bloemenzaden, die weer worden gebruikt voor diverse inzaaiprojecten als bermen, dijken en natuurherstelgebieden.

programme.title: Meteo.it
programme.desc: Previsioni meteorologiche del territorio italiano, diviso per zone geografiche, dettagliate e costantemente aggiornate.

programme.title: Luce Dei Tuoi Occhi
programme.desc: Azzurra fugge portando con se la piccola Cecilia. E se il motivo di un gesto cosi improvviso avesse a che fare con il furto di Alice? Enrico ed Emma scoprono che era stata Azzurra ad occuparsi delle pratiche ospedaliere di Emma mentre era tra la vita e la morte dopo il parto. La polizia la cerca, ma e Emma a trovare Azzurra, che le racconta sconvolta il motivo della fuga: Roberto era stato con Luigi la notte in cui luomo e stato ucciso. Roberto confessa lomicidio ed anche la verita sulla vendita di Alice in cambio dei soldi che gli servivano per saldare dei debiti. Non sa dove sia ora, nessuno la sa piu. Un momento difficile per la famiglia e per Emma, che pero ormai puo contare sullamore di Enrico. Dopo il successo della sua coreografia e delle ragazze, Emma si sofferma nel teatro vuoto: sua figlia potrebbe essere ovunque, eppure le sembra di intravederla proprio in quella ragazza che balla da sola sul palco vuoto. La ricerca di Alice non ha ancora scritto la sua ultima...

programme.title: Un altro domani
programme.desc: Julia sospetta che qualcuno abbia rubato i suoi disegni dei mobili e punta il dito contro Sergio. Nel frattempo, Dani continua a passare il tempo con il padre, il che desta i sospetti di Elena, che non e disposta a lasciare che il figlio subisca una delusione. A Rio Muni, Carmen chiede a Mabale se ha visto qualcosa di sospetto nella fabbrica, ma lui nega, sotto la pressione di Patricia. Patricia preoccupata dallinsistenza di Carmen cerca di convincere Francisco a fermarla. Nonostante le difficolta, Carmen ottiene una confessione importante. Una verita che anche Ines e Angel inseguono, sempre piu convinti che laltro nasconda informazioni molto importanti sulla notte in cui Alicia e stata uccisa. Julia e Leo si incontrano per caso e hanno un piccolo battibecco.

programme.title: Vivere
programme.desc: Carolina ha un forte litigio con Luca a proposito dei suoi rapporti di amicizia con Cloe; subito dopo e colta dal sospetto di essere incinta e percepisce questa possibilita come un intoppo alla sua carriera. Rebecca, in ansia per la lettura della sentenza del processo per la morte di Letizia, riceve una telefonata da Claudia. Rebecca decide di non presentarsi in aula e Andrea la raggiunge nel suo studio: lui ha ascoltato il verdetto finale. Dopo un incontro casuale con Daria che finisce in una spiacevole discussione, Flavia decide che vuole riprendersi quello che e suo; va a trovare Carla decisa ad accettare la proposta di Andrea. Nel frattempo le cose tra Daria e Christian vanno bene: lui decide di cercare un appartamento per vivere insieme.

programme.title: Distretto di Polizia
programme.desc: Il ragazzo di Sabina confessa a Giulia Corsi di aver comprato della droga in una discoteca. Il commissario fa fingere alcuni agenti di essere degli spacciatori.

programme.title: Buongiorno, mamma! - Dove eravamo rimasti
programme.desc: In attesa del ritorno di Buongiorno, mamma! in 1^TV, ripercorriamo le vicende della famiglia Borghi nelle prime due stagioni della serie.

programme.title: Beautiful
programme.desc: Poppy e Luna continuano a parlare dello sconosciuto padre di Luna. Luna fa capire alla madre che nonostante la ami moltissimo, ha comunque sentito la mancanza di un padre nella sua vita e vorrebbe sapere chi e. Poppy si mette a piangere e le dice che, pur comprendendo questa esigenza, ha sempre sperato che la figlia fosse felice anche con un solo genitore. Brooke (Katherine Kelly Lang) mette alle strette Hope e le chiede a che punto siano i suoi rapporti con Thomas. Hope e sulla difensiva perche sa che la madre detesta Thomas. Ma le dice ugualmente che Thomas le ha chiesto di sposarlo. Thomas (Matthew Atkinson) mostra a Ridge (Thorsten Kaye) una foto dellanello di fidanzamento che ha offerto a Hope (Annika Noelle) e che lei porta al collo come un ciondolo. Ridge, molto orgoglioso di lui, lo incoraggia e lo sostiene, ma Thomas teme ancora il giudizio di Brooke (Katherine Kelly Lang) che ha sempre osteggiato il loro rapporto.

programme.title: Yasak Elma
programme.desc: I gia delicati equilibri in casa Argun verranno messi a dura prova con larrivo di Asuman, la madre di Yildiz e Zeynep. Asuman e una donna molto forte che decide di stare vicino alla figlia durante la sua gravidanza. Questo creera tensioni tra sua figlia Yildiz e suo marito, Halit. Erim e Zehra non accolgono volentieri la madre di Yildiz, soprattutto Erim che cerchera conforto da sua madre, Ender. Nel frattempo, Alihan scopre chi era luomo che ha tradito suo padre e in preda a uno scatto di ira, devasta mezza casa. Zeynep, appena viene informata di quanto accaduto si precipita da Alihan per aiutarlo, ma sara costretta a chiedere ad Hakan di occuparsene. Nel frattempo, Yildiz e sua madre iniziano a comportarsi in modo strano. Che sia per lincontro tra Kemal e Asuman, alla Holding Argun?

programme.title: Yasak Elma
programme.desc: Yildiz, dopo aver scoperto di aver perso il bambino, decide di tenere segreta la notizia, tentando di conquistare lattenzione di Halit. La madre Asuman e sua complice. Zeynep cerca di capire cosa abbia portato Alihan a perdere la testa. Luomo continua a mentirle, ma ha una nuova reazione violenta e incontrollata quando Zeynep nomina Halit. La ragazza, inconsapevole della vera ragione dellinquietudine di Alihan, ha infatti contattato sua cugina Irem per suonare alla festa di Erim, dopo che Caner le ha chiesto aiuto. Alihan decide di prendere parte alla festa, e chiede ad Hakan di partecipare. Il suo amico accetta assicurandogli che gli dara il suo supporto, comunque lui decida di agire nei confronti di Halit. Intanto Halit, avendo capito che suo figlio Erim e a disagio con Asuman, fa intendere alla donna di non essere benvoluta alla festa, scatenando cosi lira di Yildiz.

programme.title: La forza di una donna
programme.desc: Jale, per errore, rivela a Bahar che un uomo di nome Sarp e andato in ospedale a trovare Enver durante il suo ricovero. Hatice le chiarisce che probabilmente si tratta del figlio del fruttivendolo, molto legato a Enver. Bahar decide quindi di indagare e parlare con il fruttivendolo per scoprire la verita, anche perche il piccolo Doruk afferma di aver visto suo padre in ospedale. Ceyda e Yeliz cercano di avvisare Sirin, incoraggiandola a informare il fruttivendolo prima che Bahar arrivi. Sarp chiede a Suat se ci sono aggiornamenti su sua madre.

programme.title: Dentro La Notizia
programme.desc: Il nuovo programma pomeridiano dinformazione condotto da Gianluigi Nuzzi con approfondimenti su storie, fatti e attualita.

programme.title: Avanti un altro!

programme.title: Riassunto - Tradimento
programme.desc: La famiglia ideale esiste davvero? Guzide, una rispettata giudice e madre di due splendidi figli, e felicemente sposata con Tarik da ben 30 anni e ne e certa. Ma la verita e ben diversa...

programme.title: Tradimento
programme.desc: Tutta la famiglia e contraria alla decisone di Oylum, soprattutto Kahraman, che accetta di starle vicino durante loperazione, ma che e convinto di voler divorziare appena la ragazza stara meglio. Serra confida ad Alper di voler partorire il figlio di Tolga per ottenere parte della sua eredita.

programme.title: Tradimento
programme.desc: Tolga viene sottoposto al trapianto del rene, donato da Oylum. Tutta la famiglia attende lesito delloperazione in ospedale, insieme ad Oltan. Azra va a trovare Selin in carcere e le comunica della donazione del rene di Oylum. Selin e sconvolta. Dundar va a cercare Guzide a casa, e trova solo Yesim, che vorrebbe trattenerlo fino al ritorno di Guzide, ma senza dirgli che si trova in ospedale ne il motivo. Serra indice una conferenza stampa, durante la quale afferma che e incinta di Tolga, e mostra davanti alle telecamere il test del DNA. La famiglia di Guzide apprende la notizia mentre attende lesito dellintervento. Ozan non ci crede, ritiene quello di Serra un bluff. Mualla e Ilknur, cosi come Ipek, apprendono dalla televisione la notizia della conferenza stampa e le accuse di Serra, e sono scandalizzate e sorprese. Kahraman e sempre piu afflitto, e se ne va dallospedale intenzionato a divorziare da Oylum. Lo dice con rabbia anche a Mualla.

programme.title: Tradimento
programme.desc: Kahraman va in ospedale da Oylum ma la trova in lacrime nella stanza di Tolga. Deluso da quello che vede, se ne va senza salutarla. Oylum, stranita dalla sua latitanza, gli telefona e gli chiede di portarle Can, sperando cosi di vedere sia lui sia il bambino. Lindomani, Nazan e Mualla arrivano in ospedale con Can, e Oylum intuisce che Kahraman non la voglia vedere. Oltan veglia il figlio sperando che si svegli. Viene raggiunto da Ashen e Nedret che lo ringraziano per averla fatta pagare a Emrah. Guzide assiste alla scena ed e delusa dal fatto che Oltan sia ricorso alla violenza per punire Emrah. Nel mentre, pero, riceve una telefonata da Esra che la avvisa che Emrah e Kadir, il suo amico, sono stati arrestati. Oylum viene dimessa e chiede di essere portata a casa sua. Giunta li, incontra Kahraman che, con freddezza, ammette di essere stato in ospedale e di aver visto la scena di Oylum che teneva la mano a Tolga.

programme.title: Luce Dei Tuoi Occhi
programme.desc: Emma non e riuscita a trovare Alice, ma il rapporto con Enrico e sempre piu solido. Nelle nuove audizioni in Accademia, emergono due ragazze: Vicky e Diana, diverse tra loro ma ugualmente competitive. La madre di Diana, Petra Novack confessa ad Emma di essere gravemente malata, e le chiede di prendersi cura della ragazza: questa richiesta nasconde unaltra verita, che lascia Emma sorpresa ed impaurita.

programme.title: Un altro domani
programme.desc: Carmen fa due scoperte: la prima e che i camion della fabbrica traportano armi per i ribelli, ovviamente per conto di Ventura. La seconda e che nelledizione mattutina del quotidiano e pubblicata una lettera ufficiale che certifica la presa di distanze di "Maderas Rio Muni" dalla persona di Victor Valdes, a firma di Patrizia, Francisco e Carmen. Due colpi al cuore che hanno un responsabile comune: Patricia. La pubblicazione ha ripercussioni e compromette il rapporto tra Ines e Carmen, ma Victor rassicura la madre, certo delle macchinazioni di Patricia. Continua la battaglia di nervi tra Angel e Ines, due versioni, due visioni, due ipotesi di assassinio. "La notte dei libri" e al centro dei sospetti, la dinamica dellomicidio di Alicia assume tinte ed ombre diverse a seconda delle versioni ipotizzate. Julia e alle prese con la liquidazione e ricevera il supporto inaspettato di Sergio. Cloe, di nascosto, prende il cellulare di Ribero e risponde al messaggio di conferma.

programme.title: Vivere
programme.desc: Buone notizie per Rebecca: la sua vicenda giudiziaria, che la vedeva accusata dellomicidio di Letizia, si conclude con un assoluzione piena. Inoltre riceve una proposta molto interessante da Balbo: lavorare per lui in pianta stabile, trasferendosi a Londra. Intanto Carolina decide di condividere con Luca il test di gravidanza. Lui trepida allidea di diventare padre, mentre Carolina e intimamente spaventata dalle conseguenze che la maternita porterebbe alla sua carriera artistica in pieno decollo. Doppio gioco di Andrea: da una parte sollecita Daria ad accettare il suo appoggio nella gestione della Terhatex S.p.A., dallaltra offre a Flavia e Carla il suo sostegno economico per mettere fuori gioco proprio Daria. Intanto Daria e Christian, ignari di tutto, decidono di sposarsi.

programme.title: Distretto di Polizia
programme.desc: Si cerca un narcotrafficante che si fa passare per mercante e che vive su un panfilo. Vittoria e depressa perche il giudice le ha tolto la custodia del figlio.

programme.title: Scozia: un anno selvaggio
programme.desc: Nei boschi della costa occidentale, due giovani aquile di mare coda bianca lottano fra loro per la sopravvivenza. Nelle Shetland, le piccole lontre devono lasciare le madri e partire in cerca di un proprio territorio. Nelle Highlands, un cucciolo di cervo rosso, nato piu tardi rispetto agli altri piccoli del branco, dovra crescere in fretta, per poter sopravvivere allinverno. Nella brughiera, con la fioritura dellerica, un bruco di saturnia del pero forma il proprio bozzolo, nel quale rimarra chiuso durante le stagioni fredde. Nelle foreste della Caledonia, una femmina di scoiattolo rosso deve crescere i propri piccoli nonostante la scarsita di cibo e i giovani picchi rossi maggiori imparano dai genitori a scovare le larve nelle fessure dei tronchi, mentre due esemplari di Nicrophorus vespilloides seppelliscono il cadavere di un topo selvatico per sfamare la loro futura prole. Sulle coste delle Shetland, le sule, per nutrire i piccoli, si alternano in faticose battute di pesca.

programme.title: Viaggiatori Uno Sguardo Sul Mondo
programme.desc: Alla scoperta delle bellezze artistiche e naturali del mondo, dalla Polinesia allIndonesia, dallAfrica ai Caraibi.

programme.title: Melaverde - le storie
programme.desc: Approfondimenti e curiosita su luoghi, ricette, antichi e nuovi mestieri di ogni regione italiana in compagnia di Ellen Hidding.

programme.title: Beautiful
programme.desc: A casa di Hope, Brooke cerca di convincere la figlia che i suoi sentimenti per Thomas sono soltanto una conseguenza del dolore per il fallimento del suo matrimonio con Liam (Scott Clifton) e che accettare la sua proposta sarebbe un gravissimo errore. Nel frattempo, Luna (Lisa Yamada) affronta sua madre con la domanda che la tormenta: Bill Spencer (Don Diamont) e suo padre? Poppy (Romy Parks) nega, ma Luna sospetta che la madre le stia nascondendo qualcosa, forse un oscuro segreto di famiglia. Poppy e visibilmente turbata dallinsistenza della figlia. Finn (Tanner Novlan) fa visita a Luna e si imbatte in sua zia Poppy. Finn e Poppy ricordando i bei tempi passati quando Poppy viveva con lui e i suoi genitori, Jack (Ted King) e Li (Naomi Matsuda). Brooke si confronta con Thomas riguardo alla proposta di matrimonio che ha fatto a Hope, cercando di metterlo in guardia da un possibile rifiuto e da una nuova delusione.

programme.title: La forza di una donna
programme.desc: La situazione economica di Ceyda e Yeliz e sempre piu difficile a causa della mancanza di entrate stabili. Inoltre, il denaro che speravano di ricevere da Abbas non arrivera mai: e stato espulso dal Paese e non ha saldato lordine delle camicie, che quindi sono rimaste invendute. Tuttavia, Ceyda ha unidea brillante: venderle al mercato, dove riesce a ottenere uno spazio grazie allaiuto di Arif, che si fa portavoce per loro con le sue conoscenze. Bahar viene tenuta alloscuro di tutto cio per non aggiungere un ulteriore peso alle sue preoccupazioni. Nel frattempo, la sua salute continua a peggiorare...

programme.title: La forza di una donna
programme.desc: La situazione economica di Yeliz, Ceyda e Bahar e molto critica. Arif, quindi, decide di accordarsi con Yeliz e Ceyda per andare a vendere le camicie al mercato allinsaputa di Bahar. Tuttavia, durante la loro assenza, Bahar inizia a sentirsi male. Nonostante cio, riesce a portare i suoi figli a scuola, ma non riesce a tornare a prenderli. La maestra di Doruk la contatta piu volte per capire cosa sia successo, ma Bahar non risponde.

programme.title: Verissimo
programme.desc: Nuova stagione di Verissimo dove i sentimenti, le emozioni, i sogni e gli amori degli ospiti vengono condivisi con eleganza e sensibilita. Conduce Silvia Toffanin.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Plan / The Internet / The Finale / The World / The Return / The Nemesis / The Crew
programme.desc: The Watterson kids come up with a fool-proof plan. / Gumball accidentally uploads a video of himself and wants it gone. / The Wattersons are surprised to discover that their past actions have consequences. / The life of the background objects of Elmore are shown in a series of short skits. / Richard is in charge of getting the kids to their first day back at school on time but hes overslept and now he cant find them, he has to retrace his steps. / Gumball and Darwin come face-to-face with their arch-nemesis. But is this super-villain out of control? / Gumball and Darwin attempt to join the baddest crew in town: the senior citizens! / Gumball and Darwin are shocked to realise that their class isnt the only one in Elmore Junior High.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Signature / The Gift / The Apprentice / The Check / The Pest
programme.desc: Dad discovers that Granny Jojo and Louie plan to get married and move to Florida. To stop this happening he adopts Louie so that he can forbid him from marrying Granny Jojo. / After they receive an extravagant invitation to Masamis birthday party Gumball and Darwin are anxious to find just the right gift for her. However theyre not the only ones. / Gumball sets out to prove to Pennys father that hes good enough for his daughter. / When Grandpa Louie gives them a cheque, the Watterson kids argue over how to spend the money. / When they find Anais training herself for a brutal showdown Gumball and Darwin realise that their sister is being pestered at school by an annoying kid: Billy. / An impromptu hug with a stranger at school leaves Gumball in an increasingly awkward social situation.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Routine / The Parking / The Upgrade / The Comic / The Romantic / The Uploads / The Wicked / The Traitor
programme.desc: Mom and the kids depart for their hard days work leaving a seemingly lazy Dad half-asleep on the sofa. Mom has given him one very simple job: buy mayonnaise. / The Watterson familys search for a parking space at the mall takes a little longer than expected. / Gumball and Darwin persuade Bobert to upgrade his operating system, then start to wish they hadnt. / Gumball is the star of his own comic, but struggles to match up to his heroic alter-ego. / Gumball tries to recapture the magic with Penny by organising a big romantic gesture. / Gumball and Darwin try to tear themselves away from the internet, but end up falling down the Elmore Stream-hole. / Gumball and Darwin try to find a single nice quality about their neighbour, Mrs Robinson. / When Alan ditches Gumball to do something more fun, Gumball is desperate to track him down and make him pay for his betrayal. / Mr Small feels that he hasnt inspired the children of Elmore Junior High, so Gumball and Darwin try to lift his spirits.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin accidentally create a loveable monster that eats their family. / Gumball is embarrassed when Mum comes to school to spend some “quality time”. / Gumball’s magic tinfoil helmet threatens to tear the Watterson family apart!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy comes home to the cabin and discovers the super fired-up Lemmings dancing madly to the sound of the ghetto blaster. / Straddling bats, the Lemmings organize an obstacle course in the pitch-dark cabin. / The Lemmings have a whale of a time revamping the paintings on display in the castle by painting themselves alongside the illustrated noblemen.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around – yum! But he’s told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artist’s studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time he’s let in, but will Bean’s fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

Their thoughts turn to how they first met and started on their Quest.

programme.desc: Richard is in charge of getting the kids to their first day back at school on time but hes overslept and now he cant find them, he has to retrace his steps.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Anybody / The Shippening / The Brain
programme.desc: Clayton realises he can imitate his classmates, and begins stealing the lives of the people of Elmore. / When unexpected couples in the world of Elmore start randomly falling in love, Gumball and Darwin have to figure out whats going on. / Anais has been facepalming every time her family does something stupid which has led to a serious medical condition. / Gumball questions Mr Smalls eco-friendly commitment, causing him to abandon society and live in the forest.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Signal / The Girlfriend / The Parasite / The Love / The Scam / The Awkwardness / The Nest
programme.desc: Gumball develops a strange stutter and it makes him accidentally offend Darwin. / Jamie has decided she needs a sweetheart and Darwin is the best candidate, unluckily for him. / Anais has made a new friend, but Gumball and Darwin arent sure their relationship is equal. / Bobert finds he is infected with a virus called love.exe. He asks Gumball and Darwin to give him a definition for the word. / Gumball, Darwin and Carrie team up to convince their fellow students that the school is haunted. / Gumball is walking in the same direction as Hot Dog Guy, and with each step it becomes increasingly awkward. / Elmore residents are going missing, and the cause of these disappearances may be closer to home than Gumball and Darwin think. / Gumball and Darwin agree to do all of Tobiass chores, in exchange for "good points"!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Bus / The Night / The Misunderstandings / The Roots / The Blame
programme.desc: When Rocky suggests that the Elmore Junior High kids skip school the bus is boarded by criminals who seem to want to teach them the importance of school attendance. / Ever wondered what the people of Elmore dream about? As night falls in Elmore the Moon takes us on a tour through the various dreams - and nightmares - of the inhabitants. / Gumball is late to meet Penny at the mall, but a series of misunderstandings on the way only delay him further. / When Mom sees Darwin gazing longingly at a fish-tank she thinks their mammalian lifestyle isn’t fulfilling her adopted son and deep down he longs to connect with his fishy roots. / The Parent Teacher Association of Elmore Junior High bans video games, so the kids try and prove that games arent a bad influence. / Tobias follows every single high-five with a butt-slap so when Gumball doesn’t get one he feels insulted. He tries to get Tobias to slap his rear all day but it doesn’t work.

He rewinds into the past and remembers Gumball had left him in The Void. / Sarah the new kid in school is Gumball and Darwins number one slightly obsessive fan. / Whilst Gumball and Darwin make fun of Mum and Dad for being old their voices start to break. / Miss Simian has to save herself from a contagious Joy virus infecting the whole school. / The new coach at Elmore High stands up to Jamie. / The secret behind Antons immortality.

programme.sub-title: The Puppy / The Extras / The Name / The Gripes / The Vacation / The Void / The Fraud

programme.sub-title: The Boss / The Law / The Allergy / The Mothers / The Password
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin help Rocky land an office job so that his dad Mr Robinson will be proud of him. / Gumball jaywalks and is pulled over by Donut Cop. / Darwin starts sneezing repeatedly and it seems he cant stop. / Its Mothers Day and Gumball and Darwin discover that Tobias and Banana Joe have both made a card for The Best Mum in the World. / Mum has forced Dad to install a password on the computer… / While performing a school play Gumball is so nervous about kissing Penny that he accidentally head-butts her and cracks open her shell.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball has to save Mr Robinson’s life during Elmore’s Senior Talent Show! / Gumball and Darwin spice up their friendship by introducing a third best friend... / Principal Brown tries to “fix” Gumball’s dysfunctional family.

programme.sub-title: The Prince and The Dark Lord Of Moletown / The Prince and The Squire-Off / The Prince and The Kissy Curse / The Prince and The Nutty Wedding
